title: [Large-Scale] Gamification-Enhanced Fairness Simulation Training Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Engineering fundamentals and basic programming concepts
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining participatory design and gamification elements, customized for 40s working learners, with BYOD and project-based assessment systems

learning_goals: Learners analyze actual industrial process models and propose optimization solutions using simulation tools

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
